example.title: Example
example.p: The following code sample shows an example element that contains a code block and a textual explanation of it:
example.codeblock:
ADD

New database records are created using the ADD command.

The following example illustrates the creation of a new record. All parameter settings are strictly optional.

01 OPTIONS ABC,ADD,DEF,HIJK,LMNO,AOW=25000,HF=2
